title: Why does Varus not have a bowstring?
body: And how the hell does he fire his arrows? Why did Riot decide to do this with {{champion:110}} ? Someone please explain.

replies.body:
> don't be a %%%%

Asking him to apply knowledge and read the lore and realize his bow is made from corruption isn't being a %%%%.
If you knew that, why not just say it? OP asked a simple question and you replied with passive-aggression. What is that about?

> If you knew that, why not just say it? OP asked a simple question and you replied with passive-aggression. What is that about?

"Go read his lore" is not passive-aggressive. It's all explained in that.. -.-

The only thing relevant to this I can find is "With grim resolve, he condemned himself to the black flames, feeling malevolent energy bond to his skin...and with it, the promise of ruin." So I'm guessing he uses energy to fire his arrows and such?
